name: Game Jumpers: Sources of Anity
description:
Game Jumpers: Sources of Anity Follows the tale of Kwak and Cheeseburger Johnson as they travel through different dimensions. Jumping from game to game. 

When a miscalculated portal jump spits them out in a strange dimension. Kwak and Johnson get separated. Will you be able to find and rescue johnson? Or will the Characters of Anity get the better of you?

Hi! I ran out of timmmm soo

The game ends abruptly after you talk to Gray Spike by softlock

Whoops.

I have a finished version of the game, I'm just waiting for voting to end to upload it lol.
